name: RetrieveLeadRecords
description:
Retrieve lead records by ID or custom unique property.

This tool fetches lead records from HubSpot CRM using specified record IDs or a custom unique value property if provided. It is useful for obtaining detailed information on leads based on specific identifiers.

parameters.name: lead_records_input
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details such as `idProperty`, `inputs`, and `properties` for retrieving lead records.

propertiesWithHistory.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object and their histories.

idProperty.description: When using a custom unique value property to retrieve records, the name of the property. Do not include this parameter if retrieving by record ID.

properties.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object.

parameters.name: return_archived_only
parameters.description: Return only results that have been archived. Set to 'true' to filter by archived records.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

propertiesWithHistory.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object and their histories.

idProperty.description: When using a custom unique value property to retrieve records, the name of the property. Do not include this parameter if retrieving by record ID.

properties.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
